channel.title: Underhell
channel.description:
I thought I would bring this mod to peoples attention as its a quite niffty little mod. Its status on moddb is TBD but its downloadable...
It has three parts to the game:
The house, my favourite part as its pure psychological horror.
Dreamland, think max payne dreams but less frustrating.
The chapters, Typical FPS with bullet time. Some interesting moments and its quite long for a prologue.
[COLOR='YellowGreen']Underhell is an SMOD based Half Life 2 Modification that will be distributed in Episodic releases. So far ONLY the prologue has being released... It requires Half Life 2 and Source SDK Base 2006 to run
[url]https://www.moddb.com/mods/underhell/#1966305[/url]

item.title: Underhell
item.dc:creator: bulbman
item.description:
Love this mod, the gunplay is whats best for me, sure it’s scary, but Amnesia is still scarier, anyway, great ai, feels tactical, yet is totally action packed, also doesn’t seem like a source mod at all.

Read full topic

item.title: Underhell
item.dc:creator: Vitriol
item.description:
Katana:

Anyway, I finished the shooting storyline and I’m now in the house trying to A. Find the remote, B. Find fuel for the furnace downstairs, C. Get in the bathroom (CAN’T KEEP HOLDING IT IN), D. Unlock the door at the end of the Dream Hallway.

A : Attic
B : Wood outside
C : I think its locked in the prelude
D : Dunno

The only “scary” bit I got was the feet at the window, although i saw the hand one on youtube

item.title: Underhell
item.dc:creator: p.columbo
item.description:
Hazzmat:

How the fuck do you get inside? The pussy says he doesn´t want to get in there so he doesn´t let me. Also how do I get in the hole on the ceiling in the bathroom and where do I find MOAR batteries? I’ve already used up the ones in the bedroom.

You can get in that hole in the ceiling. You just need to stack up some cardboard boxes. Three should be enough. There’s nothing there though.

Read full topic

item.title: Underhell
item.dc:creator: Katana
item.description:
Medkit:

I’ve seen some scary things in gaming history, but Amnesia is far the best in the horror genre. Tell me, how did you feel when your first met with the “brazen bull” ?
I came closer to freak out than ever before.

Normally, the scariness is in all “surprise” moments, but just reading that description of the thing made me so creeped out, I just decided to leave quickly, and thus missed the plot macguffin in the room. Of course, I then had to sneak through the big red room AGAIN to find it.

Anyway, I finished the shooting storyline and I’m now in the house trying to A. Find the remote, B. Find fuel for the furnace downstairs, C. Get in the bathroom (CAN’T KEEP HOLDING IT IN), D. Unlock the door at the end of the Dream Hallway.

Read full topic

item.title: Underhell
item.dc:creator: Hazzmat
item.description:
Smatj:

SPOILERS! SPOILERS EVERYWHERE!

Doesn’t matter. Your experience will be different. When my friend came to my house he noticed nothing happened in the attic. Apparently he shat brix when he entered the attic so don’t worry you won’t be prepared :retard:

item.title: Underhell
item.dc:creator: Smatj
item.description:
Amnesia: The dark descent is indeed by far the best horrorgame. I screamed like a schoolgirl in the cellar area. I was to scared to play it and i started playing again 2 months later.I rushed through everything and was very glad that was over with.

but seriously, that game is the biggest mindfuck ever made.

Read full topic

How the fuck do you get inside? The pussy says he doesn´t want to get in there so he doesn´t let me. Also how do I get in the hole on the ceiling in the bathroom and where do I find MOAR batteries? I’ve already used up the ones in the bedroom.

Batteries are in draws, the shed the basement. Once your out of them though thats it…

As a fan of Amnesia: The Dark Descent, I take that as a challenge.
